feed.title: The Linguistic Review
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in The Linguistic Review

entry.title: Comparing syntactic and discourse accounts of islands and parasitic gaps: experimental evidence from acceptability judgments
entry.summary: Article by Cas W. Coopmans, Kars Ligtenberg, Michelle Suijkerbuijk, Gert-Jan Schoenmakers DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/tlr-2025-2005

entry.title: Clausal doubling produces phantom islands
entry.summary: Article by Carlos Muñoz Pérez, Matías Verdecchia DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/tlr-2025-2006

entry.title: On reducedwh-questions in Dagara
entry.summary: Article by Alain Noindonmon Hien, Daiko Takahashi DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/tlr-2025-2007

entry.title: Passivization strategies under ECM: evidence from Spanish dialects
entry.summary: Article by Ángel J. Gallego DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/tlr-2025-2008
